page.title: 15TRADE
page.content: Shopping was another area considered and surveyed. The results varied within the different parts of the reg- ion. Within the town of{Herne Bay}61% interviewed claimed to do all their shopping in the town. There were many elderly in this group. In the areas of {Grenhill & Herne}village,with fewer shops,80% of people prefered to shop elsewhere. Bus routes to Canterbury influenced the choice of Herne people. For a shopping trip out of the area {Canterbury}was favourite with 75% of those interviewed,whilst a further 14% prefered the Thanet towns of{Margate & {Ramsgate.}Other shopping destinations were{Chatham,Gillingham and Maidstone. Herne Bay is a self-contained shopping area with a wide variety of shops.
